snippet: A favorable exchange rate, low interest rates and a drop in property prices are making real estate in France an attractive investment for foreigners.
abstract: International House Hunting column; six-bedroom house with indoor and outdoor pools in Provence near Nice, France, is listed at $3.9 million; information about market and tips for buying properties in Provence highlighted.
lead_paragraph: A favorable exchange rate, low interest rates and a drop in property prices are making real estate in France an attractive investment for foreigners.
